Text: Vince My name is Maria Teresa AguileraPeon I forwarded you the emails from Dr Kloucek a few weeks ago I know that you must be very busy but I was wondering if you would have time to meet with me sometime perhaps over lunch See I graduated from Rice majored in Applied Math a couple of years ago and I am considering a PhD in Financial Math I would like to work in idustry afterwards not academia But I am wondering what type of jobs there are for people like that in companies like Enron and I figured you would be a good person to ask So if you find yourself with a little free time I would be very grateful to be able to ask you a few questions Thanks Maria Teresa
